page.title: HP Wireless Dual Band 802.11n USB Adapter (JD039A)

revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = HP_JD039A.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = HP Dual Band 802.11n Wireless USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = HP_Wireless_Dual_Band_802.11n_USB_Adapter_(JD039A) |wikipedia = |brand = HP |model = JD039A |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 5, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/HP_Wireless_Dual_Band_802.11n_USB_Adapter_(JD039A) |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = O9C-WL606 |icid = 2299L-WL606 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Atheros;AR9170; |chip2 = Atheros;AR9104; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/27/2009 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 885631160589 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003OX73U0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== According to HP documentation, this is the HP branded version of the [[3Com 3CRUSBN275]]. It is also referred to as the ''HP''' WL-606 in HP documentation. :Per that, the relevant data from the 3CRUSBN275 has been assigned to this entry. {{WiFiCert|WFA7809|09/08/2009}} ==Links of Interest== [https://h10145.www1.hp.com/Downloads/DownloadSoftware.aspx?SoftwareReleaseUId=9473&ProductNumber=JD039A&lang=en&cc=us&prodSeriesId=5193889&SerialNumber=&PurchaseDate= Official Windows drivers] (WinXP, Vista x86/x64, Windows 7 x86.x64)
